Articles.Content:
ALRIGHT... I got blender. I start off with a square block

> 
> Please don\'t post images like that, or at least spoiler them.

Help?
Anonymous mod.... SHow yourself, sand gimme my image back so I can spoiler it..

Twinky, the picture was not really appropriate. If you have a question about modeling, ask it, but do so in a good manner and be sure to get to the point. Posting large images that don\'t give us who want to help you any information aren\'t going to help get you assistance.

I think you should learn how to play the game before making parts. Judging by the post where you were totally confused about basic terms, you have a lot to do before you should worry about modeling... 

And try not to be so rude to mods and tell them to 'show themselves'.

There are plenty of Blender tutorial videos around, such as these: [http://cgcookie.com/blender/get-started-with-blender/](http://cgcookie.com/blender/get-started-with-blender/) Can\'t really vouch for them, as I\'ve only been through the first couple myself.

There\'s some KSP-specific info here: [http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4032.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4032.0)

Hasn\'t helped me much yet; when I unroll my cylinder, I don\'t seem to get a nice rectangular shape; I usually wind up with something that looks like an upside-down omega. Haven\'t figured out why yet.

> 
> I think you should learn how to play the game before making parts. Judging by the post where you were totally confused about basic terms, you have a lot to do before you should worry about modeling... 
> 
> And try not to be so rude to mods and tell them to 'show themselves'.

Good sir, I have played this since there was no maps. No ASAS. No thrust vectoring. No NOTHING

As for the disrespect mods, I jsut wanted to make a joke...

> 
> Good sir, I have played this since there was no maps. No ASAS. No thrust vectoring. No NOTHING
> 
> As for the disrespect mods, I jsut wanted to make a joke...

Yeah, but you posted a thread saying you wanted a 'simple mechjeb' because the regular one was too confusing. Someone told you about pro-grade and you said, 'SMART A.S.S.? Prograde? WTF is that?!'
So? I\'m no rocket scientist. I\'ve made it to the Mun millions of times though. Simple question about prograde retrograde. Sheesh.
You\'ve made it to the Mun millions of times but you don\'t know how to get into orbit?

> 
> You\'ve made it to the Mun millions of times but you don\'t know how to get into orbit?

I do. I just know the controls, not rocket science-ey stuff. I know some, just not a lot. PLUS, I was asking, just \'cause I\'m too lazy to set everything up with mechjeb.
Okay, Twinky, do you have anything to ask about modeling, or should I just lock this thread?
